name: ScoreBoard
0:
”Alexa, open score board and new match tennis”
”Alexa, open score board and tell me what is the score?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: score board
des:
How many times have you argued with your friends while playing tenis because of the current score? Forget about having to keep the score in memory with this skill so you can focus on your skills.

The supported sports are:

- Soccer
- Waterpolo
- Handball
- Voleyball
- Tennis
- Padel
- Ping Pong

If you need any other sport you just need to send an email to fgarciarico@gmail.com and I will be pleased to add it
